author: wsjcom
title: Mary Chapin Carpenter Still Pines for Her Childhood Home in Princeton, N.J.
text:
Mary Chapin Carpenter, 60, is a five-time Grammy-winning singer-songwriter. Her latest album is “Sometimes Just the Sky” (Lambent Light). She spoke with Marc Myers.
I still dream about the house I lived in for the first 10 years of my life. In those dreams, I’m flying over the house and can see me as a child standing in front of my bedroom window.
My...
